short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to filter prime and best sellers from Amazon search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Only working solution that give many options to filter the results on amazon website. It provide multiple options like Prime only, Best sellers only, Non prime only and a default view.

Please reach out if you have any issue Or want any other features implemented.
